summary: The diff implements both requirements successfully. REQ-1 (Jhajha Marathon branding update) is fully implemented in DeploymentInfo.tsx with the correct URL and QR code reference. REQ-2 (prizes loading fix) is addressed through improved error handling, retry logic, and proper data fetching in useQueries.ts and PrizesDisplay.tsx. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the code changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added comprehensive prize structure for age categories (under18, 18-35, 36-50, over50) with multiple placements and amounts beyond the overall category
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states as constraint to 'Preserve existing prize structure in backend (overall category with ₹5000/₹3000/₹1000)' and non-goal is 'Changing prize amounts or categories'. The backend now includes prizes for under18, between18And35, between36And50, and over50 categories with amounts like ₹1500/₹1000/₹500 per category.

hallucinated_features.description: Added 'Medals for All Participants' banner in prizes display
hallucinated_features.reason: This feature was not requested in the BuildRequest. The requirement was only to fix the prizes loading functionality and display existing prize data correctly.
